analysis.description:
Crowdsale.claimFunds (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#871-882) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- wallet.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#880-881)

Crowdsale.historyIt (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#621-624) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(address(this).balance == 0)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol):
	External calls:
	- (totalTokens,beneficiaryTokens,extraTokens,refererTokens,refererAddress) = calculateEthAmount(_beneficiary,_weiAmount,timestamp,token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	- require(bool)(validPurchase(_beneficiary,_weiAmount,beneficiaryTokens,extraTokens,totalTokens,timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- beneficiaryInvest (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol):
	External calls:
	- (totalTokens,beneficiaryTokens,extraTokens,refererTokens,refererAddress) = calculateEthAmount(_beneficiary,_weiAmount,timestamp,token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	- require(bool)(validPurchase(_beneficiary,_weiAmount,beneficiaryTokens,extraTokens,totalTokens,timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	- shipTokens(_beneficiary,beneficiaryTokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	- shipTokens(extraTokensHolder,extraTokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	- shipTokens(record.refererAddress,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- soldTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)

Crowdsale.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#849-870) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-TokenInterface(_token).transferFrom(_from,address(this),_value) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#855)

Crowdsale.shipTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	-token.mint(address(this),_amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)

Crowdsale.forwardTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-allowedToken.transferFrom(_beneficiary,address(this),_amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)

Crowdsale.receiveApproval (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#849-870) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(shipAmount > 0) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#868)

Crowdsale.setTime (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#486-495) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_end > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#492-493)

Crowdsale.calculateEthAmount (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#658-705) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- bonus > 0 (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#684-689)

Crowdsale.calculateTimeBonus (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#717-724) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- timeSlices[index - 1] < _at (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#721)

Crowdsale.validPurchase (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#724-766) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- ! isMinimumInEther && _tokenAmount < minimumPurchaseValue (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#739-741)
	- _time < startTime || _time > endTime (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#744)
	- finalTotalSupply > hardCap (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#762-765)

Crowdsale.ended (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#798-804) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- capped() || block.timestamp >= endTime (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#801-804)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#827-834) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(shipAmount > 0) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol#833)

Crowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase(_beneficiary,_weiAmount,beneficiaryTokens,extraTokens,totalTokens,timestamp)) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb96f18ad5d26f7b86b969526c30385838dbf91d7.sol)
